clinical_study.brief_title: Comparison of Changes of ONSD Between Groups of Laparoscopic Surgery With and Without Epidural Saline Injection
clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of Changes of ONSD Between Groups of Laparoscopic Surgery With and Without Epidural Saline Injection

brief_summary.textblock:
This study targets patients undergoing laparoscopic gastric cancer surgery.
The investigators would like to compare two factors that influence intracranial pressure through optic nerve sheath diameter measurement.
First factor is intraperitoneal pressure.
Second factor is epidural pressure.
The investigators divided the patients into three groups.
Group A is patients with laparoscopic gastric surgery who received epidural injection through an thoracic epidural catheter.
Group B is patients with laparoscopic gastric surgery who don't received epidural injection through an thoracic epidural catheter.
Group C is patients with open gastric surgery.

primary_outcome.description: The investigator measures Optic nerve sheath diameter by ultrasonography.
The investigator measures Optic nerve sheath diameter.
The investigator measures Optic nerve sheath diameter.
The investigator measures Optic nerve sheath diameter.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Laparoscopic gastric surgery with Epidural injection
arm_group.description: Patients with laparoscopic gastric surgery who received epidural injection through an thoracic epidural catheter.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Laparoscopic gastric surgery without Epidural injection
arm_group.description: Patients with laparoscopic gastric surgery who don't received epidural injection through an thoracic epidural catheter.

intervention.intervention_name: Epidural injection through thoracic epidural catheter
intervention.description: The investigators inject drugs through a catheter inserted into the thoracic epidural space to control pain after surgery in patients undergoing gastric surgery by laparoscopy.
intervention.arm_group_label: Laparoscopic gastric surgery with Epidural injection

intervention.description: The investigators don't epidural injection to find out the effect of only inter-abdominal pressure on intracranial pressure.
intervention.arm_group_label: Laparoscopic gastric surgery without Epidural injection

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Gastric surgery due to cancer
Exclusion Criteria:
- Coagulopathy
- Infection
- Previous history of thoracic spine surgery
- Ophthalmic diseases
- History of increased Intracranial Pressure
